full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAG BSAM SHING GI SGRUB PA YI DVAGS SKYE SGO GCOD THABS BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING DU 'GRO BA'I LAM RGYAGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
